name: Cards&Dices
description:
This game was made for GMTK 2022 game jam. The theme is "The roll of the dice".

Gameplay

this is small game where you decide your and opponent's move with dices. Dices have different ranges so be careful.

Assets

https://freemusicarchive.org/music/ava-drumm/single/canon-in-d-major-piano-only/
